# Welcome to the Dutch Development Economics Network (DUDE)

Our mission is to facilitate knowledge exchange and connections among development economists based in the Netherlands. Our Members are researchers at the seven participating universities. We organize two annual Events: a general workshop and a workshop dedicated to PhD students. We are also affiliated to the European Development Economics Group.
